caption.p: Interaction of bioactives from medicinal plants with their proteins and regulated pathways. In the figure higher the node interaction, the higher is its size and vice versa. Similarly, the node with lower interaction is indicated by green color and gradually increases to blue. Medicinal plants, their phytoconstituents, modulated targets, and regulated pathways are represented by ν, ●, ■, and ▲ respectively.
